fields.name: vehntInClosingPositions
docs: The vehnt amount associated with positions that are closing this epoch. This is the amount that will be subtracted from the subdao
total vehnt after the epoch passes. Typically these positions close somewhere between the epoch start and end time, so we cannot rely
on fall rate calculations alone without knowing the exact end date of each position. Instead, just keep track of what needs to be

fields.name: fallRatesFromClosingPositions
docs: The vehnt amount that is decaying per second, with 12 decimals of extra precision. Associated with positions that are closing this epoch,
which means they must be subtracted from the total fall rate on the subdao after this epoch passes

fields.name: delegationRewardsIssued
docs: The number of delegation rewards issued this epoch, so that delegators can claim their share of the rewards

fields.name: rewardsIssuedAt
docs: The program only needs to know whether or not rewards were issued, however having a history of when they were issued could prove
useful in the future, or at least for debugging purposes

fields.name: hntRewardsIssued
docs: The number of hnt rewards issued to the reward escrow this epoch

fields.name: delegatorPool
docs: DEPRECATED: use dao.delegator_pool instead. But some people still need to claim old DNT rewards

fields.name: dcBurnAuthority
docs: Authority to burn delegated data credits

errors.name: InvalidDataIncrease
errors.msg: The realloc increase was too large

errors.name: UtilityScoreAlreadyCalculated
errors.msg: Utility score was already calculated for this sub dao

errors.name: EpochNotOver
errors.msg: Cannot calculate rewards until the epoch is over

errors.name: MissingUtilityScores
errors.msg: All utility scores must be calculated before rewards can be issued

errors.name: NoUtilityScore
errors.msg: The subdao does not have a utility score

errors.name: PositionAlreadyPurged
errors.msg: This staking position has already been purged

errors.name: RefreshNotNeeded
errors.msg: This position is healthy, refresh not needed

errors.name: FailedVotingPowerCalculation
errors.msg: Failed to calculate the voting power

errors.name: InvalidClaimEpoch
errors.msg: Rewards need to be claimed in the correct epoch order

errors.name: EpochTooEarly
errors.msg: Epochs start after the earliest emission schedule

errors.name: MustCalculateVehntLinearly
errors.msg: Must calculate vehnt linearly. Please ensure the previous epoch has been completed

errors.name: PositionChangeWhileDelegated
errors.msg: Cannot change a position while it is delegated

errors.name: EpochNotClosed
errors.msg: This epoch was not closed, cannot claim rewards.

errors.name: NoDelegateEndingPosition
errors.msg: Cannot delegate on a position ending this epoch
